## Setup Instructions\n\n### 1. Access U:
## Setup Instructions

### 1. Access Uscreen Webhook Settings
- Log into your **Uscreen Admin Panel**
- Navigate to **Settings** > **Webhooks**

### 2. Create New Webhook
- Click **"New Webhook"**
- **Callback URL**: 
```text
{{webhookUrl}}
```
- Select the appropriate event 
- Click **Save**
